longBusinessSummary: Marblegate Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effectuating a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Rye, New York.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jeffrey Adam Kravetz CPA, CPA
companyOfficers.title: CFO & Principal Accounting Officer
